company_overview.mission_statement: V-Art streamlines data licensing for brands and AI, transforming a slow and cumbersome process into a fast, efficient solution. They aim to unlock incremental revenue for brands and AI teams in compliance with regulations by streamlining internal licensing and providing faster access to high-quality data.
key_milestones: Participation in Google for Startups Accelerator
MVP Launch: Developed a Minimum Viable Product for their data licensing platform
Focus on launching AI-driven bulk licensing
company_overview.current_status: Seed Stage, actively developing and scaling their AI-driven data licensing platform. Participating in Google for Startups Accelerator. Actively seeking to unlock revenue opportunities for IP and digital assets.
company_overview.unique_value_proposition: V-Art offers a flexible, AI-enabled, blockchain-powered technology that reduces IP licensing and management from months to minutes. This provides brands and AI teams with faster access to high-quality data, unlocking incremental revenue in compliance with regulations. They aim to solve the problem of underutilized digital content and the challenges AI tools face in accessing high-quality data sets due to outdated licensing processes.
